episodes.description: For the first episode in our series on para-sports in the lead up to the Paralympics, we'll check out an anime by a top manga creator that shows off the thrills and spills of Football 5-a-side.
episodes.subtitle: Episode 1: Football 5-a-side
episodes.title: Ani x Para World

episodes.description: For our second episode in this series celebrating para-sports through anime, we'll take a closer look at Para athletics, and meet one of Japan's top runners as she prepares for the Paralympics.
episodes.subtitle: Episode 2: Para Athletics
episodes.title: Ani x Para World
